lines.text: What do you take me for, an idiot? Well, you'll find out just how wrong you are!
An idiot? Oh, no, you're no idiot, my love! What you are is an hysterical lunatic!
An hysterical lunatic? And who the hell is this Federica telephoning every ten minutes with that sexy voice of hers?
Cut it out. This Federica, whoever she is, has got to be a client.
I guess we'd better get going. It's beginning to get very cold.
